game.name: Zombie Shooter 3D
game.description:
Shooting a horde of zombies is not at all an easy task to do. And, this job becomes the toughest one when you see almost all dead zombies continuously coming forward to you. Of course, you try to put all your shooting ability to test to overcome the situation and save your life from these blood-thirsty souls. The only thing that can save you from these evil monsters is to kill them before them attack you. This brand new action packed game is all about the survival in an environment filled with many zombies.
Do you think that you are in a condition to fight against them and protect the innocent civilians of your city? Join Zombie Shooter 3D and take a chance to face off the biggest zombie invade! Your objective in this cool html5 game is to wipe them out and stay alive for as long as possible. They will come towards you continuously. Keep shooting them down to protect your face from these ugly monsters! Once they cross the line, they do not show sympathy towards you and eat your face immediately. 
Shoot zombies with your matchless powers and ultimate shooting skills to ensure your win in this intense first-person shooter game! You will have the full control on the character that is lashed with a gun full of bullets. The area you see on the screen is full of zombies. Show these monsters that you are the biggest fighter of this planet by killing as many as possible! The awesome graphics and fabulous gameplay will give you the best thrilling hours. Play more new scary games online for free on atmegame.com!
